parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Structured Text

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a [[Structured Text]] by joining the given [[Structured Text | structured]] or [[String | plain]] text arguments.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[composeText]] [argument1, argument2, ...]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [argument1, argument2, ...]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> argument: [[String]] or [[Structured Text]] - use [[Structured Text]] where necessary (see [[#Examples|Example 2]])

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["Image: ", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["line1", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><br/></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>", "line2"];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result displayed in one line</value></part></template>
[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["line1", [[lineBreak]], "line2"];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result displayed in two lines</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]], [[formatText]], [[image]], [[lineBreak]], [[parseText]], [[text]], [[setAttributes]]
</value></part></template>
